programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Blind Kitchen: Butter Bing!
programme.desc: Chef Michael Ferrazzani, creator of Ya Mamma’s sauce, challenges the North End born Italian stallion, Chef Kenny Palazzolo, to a true neighborhood duel. Can Michael’s Grandma inspired dish bring down the chef who lives, laughs and cooks Italian?

programme.title: Ballin' in Baltimore
programme.sub-title: Ballin' in Baltimore: Angel Sets Sail with Maritime Mogul Bobby LaPin in Iconic Baltimore Harbor
programme.desc: Angel gets her sea legs with Maritime mogul, Captain Bobby LaPin. They sail Baltimore's iconic harbor, dive deep into the city's green initiatives, shuck oysters, and head out crabbing with the best seafarers Charm City has to offer.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Toy Box Killer
programme.desc: One evening in 1999, Cythnia Jaramillo shows up at a home wearing nothing but a dog collar. She had been tortured and sexually assaulted for days. Her escape leads investigators to discover a gruesome string of kidnappings and murders.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It! Baltimore: Fry Fest Challenge
programme.desc: Everything's better fried, right? Chefs Melanie Kerr and Colin Liang put that hypothesis to the test in this Fry Fest challenge. Will their ideas come out crisped to perfection, or sad and soggy?

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Pike County Massacre
programme.desc: After eight members of one family were killed in their homes in a single night, residents of the devastated Ohio community were left to wonder if they were next.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Collect $200 And Do Paso Robles, CA
programme.desc: If it’s pleasure you seek, you’ll find it here. Delight in sipping luxurious wines or crave elevated dining experiences? Satisfy your urges in this alluring town. We’ll take you on a thrilling ride and bring you to fields that glow.

programme.title: Human Race by Runner's World
programme.sub-title: Human Race by Runner's World
programme.desc: Runner-in-Chief, Jeff Dengate spotlights inspiring runners making a difference.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Alien Surprises in Roswell, NM
programme.desc: Embark on an out-of-this-world journey to Roswell, New Mexico! Unveil intriguing alien mysteries, order from a McDonald's with a secret menu and stay the night in a Cold War missile bunker. Don't miss this extraordinary adventure!

programme.title: Stitch
programme.sub-title: Stitch: Inspiring Kids
programme.desc: Stories of kids and teens persevering through adversity.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Blind Kitchen: Re-creating Indian Butter Sauce Grooper vs. Woodfired Octopus
programme.desc: In this battle, it's a culinary inferno, as Chef Bruno Zacchini of Pizza Bruno in College Park & Curry Ford West takes on Chef Amanda Czekaj of Farm & Haus in Audubon Park. There's no escaping the heat on this episode of Blind Kitchen.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: Unmasking The Golden State Killer
programme.desc: The Golden State Killer, also known as the East Area Rapist, remained a mystery for years.

programme.title: Ballin' in Baltimore
programme.sub-title: Ballin' in Baltimore: Activist Nyki Robinson Intros Angel to Baltimore's Most Impactful Changemakers
programme.desc: Angel partners with Black Girls Vote founder, Nyki Robinson, to celebrate Baltimore's brightest Black changemakers. They spotlight a mission-driven clothing brand, a celebrated restaurant, powerful art and an incredible urban farm.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It! Sacramento: Going Vegetarian
programme.desc: Seasonal ingredients are the stars of any dish, and Chef Chris Barnum-Dann and Chef Brett Bohlmann prove it in this fully vegetarian episode. Will the judges fawn over their flavors, or will they miss the meat?

programme.title: What's On The Menu?
programme.sub-title: What's On The Menu, Greenville? Global Flavors
programme.desc: Join us on an international culinary tour of Greenville as we dine on Birria tacos at Califas, Falafels at Pita House, curries and dosas at Swad Indian Restaurant and torched salmon rolls at Purple International Bistro & Sushi

programme.title: FIXT
programme.sub-title: FIXT: Mom With Traumatic Past Wants To Smile Again
programme.desc: A horrific accident doomed Allison to a lifetime of pain and failed surgeries. In search of a brighter smile, Mar-cia’s seen half a dozen dentists, but remains unsatisfied. Can FIXT tech meet the needs of their deserving clients?

programme.title: Unbelievable
programme.sub-title: Unbelievable: Rescues From the Brink
programme.desc: Brace yourself for heart-stopping heroics as rescuers leap into action! A semi-truck teeters dangerously over the Ohio River, a devastating gas explosion reduces homes to rubble, and a capsized cargo ship leaves its crew fighting for survival.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: A Hauntingly Refreshing Getaway to Excelsior Springs, MO
programme.desc: Hop aboard an old school trolley for a tour of local wineries. Mingle with ghosts and see what’s on tap at the historic Hall of Waters, eat barbecue in a 100-year-old train station, and surrender to the comforts of the ultimate glampsite.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: The Oddest Cases of Family on the Wrong Side of the Law
programme.desc: Siblings stealing money from a Girl Scout? A father-daughter burglary ring? In these unusual cases, family members find themselves in hot water with the justice system.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Local Love: World Traveler Comes Home for Love
programme.desc: After traveling the world, Colleen is back home in Cincinnati looking to settle down but not settle. As she looks to find her forever mate, three single guys try impress her with a painting, curling on the ice and a tango lesson.

programme.title: The Lost Children of Carlisle
programme.sub-title: The Lost Children of Carlisle
programme.desc: A powerful look at the history of Native American boarding schools as told through the stories of tribal members and their surviving family members, who endured an educational system founded on the concept “Kill the Indian in him, and save the man.”

programme.title: Game On: Fight for the Kings
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Game On: Fight for the Kings is a KCRA 3 documentary with never-before-heard stories of the four-month fight, the friendships garnered between the rival cities, and Sacramento doing the unimaginable: winning the battle for the Kings.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Join New Hampshire-based band Recycled Percussion as they perform acts of kindness in their community, and across the country. In each episode, you'll witness the great lengths and hilarious things they're willing to do in the name of kindness.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: In this game show, comedian Frank Nicotero hits the streets to ask people questions inspired by the wildest news stories for a chance at winning a cash prize. These real-life stories with unreal outcomes will make you say, “Wait, What Happened?"

programme.title: Heroes On Call
programme.sub-title: Heroes On Call: The Forgotten Story of America's First Paramedics
programme.desc: In the 1960s, Americans were dying at shocking rates due to inadequate emergency care. Enter Freedom House Ambulance Service: the first paramedics unit in the U.S., run and staffed by Black men and women. This is the origin story of EMS.

programme.title: On The Job
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Orlando expert, Brendan O'Connor, celebrates the people behind the scenes of the businesses that make Orlando a truly unique place. Join him as he rolls up his sleeves and receives hands on training while spending a day with them, On The Job.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Crimes, Cons & Capers explores some of the wildest headline-grabbing crimes and far-fetched escapades from across the country including bizarre love scams, high-speed car chases, risky prison breaks and more.

programme.title: Mo Gaba: Spirit Lives Forever
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: How a child living with cancer changed the Baltimore sports community forever.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Embark on amazing adventures across America with host Kinga Philipps who takes locals out of their comfort zones to experience transformation in the great outdoors.

programme.title: Maker Nation
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Maker Nation

programme.title: Maker Nation Challenge
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Makers, crafters and artists square off to create the most iconic art piece that best represents their city. From glass-blowers and chalk artists to metalsmiths and tattooers, see who Host Ashley Adams and the judges will crown the victor.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Toy Box Killer
programme.desc: One evening in 1999, Cythnia Jaramillo shows up at a home wearing nothing but a dog collar. She had been tortured and sexually assaulted for days. Her escape leads investigators to discover a gruesome string of kidnappings and murders.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.sub-title: Stitch: 10 Heartwarming Tales of Technology Changing Lives
programme.desc: From the internet to artificial intelligence, modern technology has made a massive mark on our society. This episode of Stitch dives into all the ways technology can improve our lives and make a positive impact.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It! Sacramento: Breakfast for Dinner
programme.desc: Everybody loves a hearty breakfast for dinner, but will Chef Sean Rumery or Chef Collin Torres most impress the judges with their elevated spin on a classic? Find out on this egg-cellent episode of Plate It!

programme.title: Weathering the Storm
programme.sub-title: Weathering the Storm: Couple Faces Historic Tornado on Eve of Wedding
programme.desc: On December 10, 2021, a violent tornado outbreak hit western Kentucky. It was the deadliest weather event in the history of the Commonwealth. But as families faced a bleak holiday season, hope emerged in surprising ways.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Football Star Shooting
programme.desc: A beloved University of Kentucky football player is murdered on the porch of his house during his 21st birthday party in an assassination-style killing. What leads to the shooter's capture is equally shocking.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Losing Pickleball for Charity and Celebrating Resilience
programme.desc: Ryan, Justin, and Jimmy enjoy a Cincinnati summer playing pickleball for charity. Ryan and Jimmy compete in an ice cream taste test. Later, Justin takes a young lady on a shopping spree to celebrate her resilience in addressing her mental health.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Local Love: A New Morning For The Dating Scene
programme.desc: Retired and recently widowed, Morning is moving into the next chapter of her life and finding ways to meet new people in Sacramento. She and her dates will learn about plants, cakes and music, and prove you’re never too old to put yourself out there.

programme.title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot
programme.sub-title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot: NFL Stud, Vivacious Host, & T-Shirt Royalty Reveal Top Hot Spots
programme.desc: In Kansas City, local notables Shawn Barber, Charlie Hustle and Nikki Vivas tell you why you need to suit up for electro-muscle stimulation, where to target a good time with ax throwing and how to find an underground speakeasy.

programme.title: Unbelievable
programme.sub-title: Unbelievable: Rescues From the Brink
programme.desc: Brace yourself for heart-stopping heroics as rescuers leap into action! A semi-truck teeters dangerously over the Ohio River, a devastating gas explosion reduces homes to rubble, and a capsized cargo ship leaves its crew fighting for survival.

programme.title: Key Bridge Disaster: Reflect, Recover, Rebuild
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: "Key Bridge Disaster: Reflect, Recover, Rebuild," examines the lives impacted in the hours, days and months following the collapse, telling the stories of first responders, workers at the Port of Baltimore, business owners and employees, and the people living in nearby communities.

programme.title: Juvenile Lifers: Road to Redemption
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2019) Juvenile Lifers: Road to Redemption focuses on people who were sentenced to life in prison as juveniles. WGAL News 8's Matt Barcaro examines how these these former offenders are re-entering society and the reaction from victims' families.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Missing Paperboys
programme.desc: A 12-year-old paperboy's disappearance during his Sunday morning route shocks a peaceful Iowa city. Panic sets in when a second paperboy goes missing.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Woman's Day: Kind-Hearted 10-year-old Gets Showered With Thanks
programme.desc: Catalina, a 10-year-old community hero with a heart of gold spends her days giving back. Today, Meaghan surprises Catalina with a day of her own, from Sea adventures to a new set of wheels and more. It's her time to shine.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Running on Empty & Finishing with Family
programme.desc: Justin pushes body and mind through seven brutal marathons on seven continents in seven days. From frostbite in Antarctica to his daughter joining him for the final steps in Miami, this is the most intense and inspiring challenge of his life.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Comedians, podcasters and craft beer enthusiasts Ed Bailey and Day Bracey explore hot spots, hidden gems and the best places to grab a cold brew in the 'Burgh.
